question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and turn back towards the buildings at back. now move forward over the buildings till the small white building arrives at your front and get down towards it top. now get up and turn left towards the gray tower at left and move closer it. now turn back and move forward over the buildings and get down to the top of the yellow banner at below. now get up and turn back and fly over the buildings till the white building arrives before the road. now move closer to the white building at right and get up and turn left towards the buildings at left. now move forward over the buildings and move towards the gray building at front of you and move closer to it and stay there.]. You move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I gradually decrease.  
B. I am near the white building on the right.  
C. I move forward past the buildings towards the gray building ahead, approach it, and stay there.  
D. I turn left and head to the gray tower on the left.  
E. I turn back and fly over the buildings until the white building reaches the road.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The sequence of images shows a progression where the agent has moved forward over the buildings and is now approaching a prominent gray building, aligning with the instruction to "move forward over the buildings and move towards the gray building at front of you and move closer to it and stay there." The current view in the images indicates that the agent is nearing this destination.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 17), (17, 32)]
Option: [C]
Reason: The video shows the agent flying over buildings and approaching a cluster of gray buildings. The instruction was to "move forward over the buildings and move towards the gray building at front of you and move closer to it and stay there." The video shows the agent is in the process of doing that.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The sequence of images shows a progression where the agent has moved forward over the buildings and is now approaching a prominent gray building, aligning with the instruction to "move forward over the buildings and move towards the gray building at front of you and move closer to it and stay there." The current view in the images indicates that the agent is nearing this destination.
